attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the failure of all four home nations to qualify for next summer's European Championships, I petition the prime minister to open a national football academy where our youngster's can have access to top quality football coaching to improve the standard of British football players of the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
